Question
========
A teacher is interested in how the number of hours that students have studied ("**HOURS**") on the score on a particular test ("**SCORE**"). He conducts a regression analysis with these two variables, using data from a sample of 160 students.  
  
This leads to the following linear model: SCORE = 2.30 + 0.80 \* HOURS.
